Founded by local farmers

Since we got our start in 2002, Tonne Winery has become an industry leader by focusing on relationships first and ran by local and passionate growers.

About Us

Great wine selection

Our national wine portfolio offers a variety of thoughtfully crafted wine brands that are accessible and appealing to a wide range of consumers.

Our National Brands

Only the best of the best

We create a variety of exclusive brands tailored to meet the needs of our customers, including leading retailers, restaurants, and hospitality interests.

LOCALLY SOURCED GRAPES

We believe that caring for the soil is the right thing to do. In 2014, we made a conscious decision to formalize our Sustainability Initiatives across the company and with our long-term partners. Now weâ€™re working to become a certified sustainable winery.
